backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining client, task, assignee, and user profile storage with access control and CRUD helpers.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence file listing new dashboard analytics, drilldown behavior, and inline comment editing with related source files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregated summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file across pages, hooks, components, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variables, and global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app with favicon and root mount element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app routing setup with authentication checks, profile setup gating, and defensive search‑param validation.
frontend/src/components/assignees/Assign: Dialog enabling CSV-based bulk assignee upload with validation, preview, and mutation-based submission.
Dialog form for creating, editing, and deleting assignees with validation and loading states.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting users to enter their name and save their profile on first use.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignedOutSc: Landing screen for signed‑out users with login button and feature highlights.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientBu: CSV upload dialog that parses client rows, validates them, and submits bulk client creation.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientFo: Dialog form for adding, editing, and deleting individual clients with field validation.
frontend/src/components/errors/AppStartu: Error boundary that catches startup errors and displays a fallback screen.
frontend/src/components/errors/StartupEr: Fallback error screen prompting the user to reload the page.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with navigation, header, mobile menu, and user profile controls.
frontend/src/components/tasks/InlineComm: Inline editor allowing users to view and update a task's comment with save/cancel controls and error handling.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskBulkEd: Dialog for bulk editing multiple tasks, building an updates list based on provided field values and submitting via bulk update mutation.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskBulkUp: Dialog for CSV-based bulk task creation, supporting template download, CSV parsing, validation display, and submitting parsed tasks to backend.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskDetail: Read‑only task details panel displaying all task fields in a structured layout with formatted dates and currency.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskFormDi: Create/edit task dialog with a full form, handling field population, validation, and submission via create or update mutations.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskQuickS: Compact status selector that updates a task’s status directly through a mutation.
frontend/src/constants/taskStatus.ts: Defines allowed task statuses and utilities for normalizing, validating, mapping legacy statuses, and preparing values for UI selects.
frontend/src/hooks/assignees.ts: React Query hooks for fetching, creating, updating, and deleting assignees, including bulk operations and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/clients.ts: React Query hooks for CRUD and bulk operations on clients, managing queries via the actor and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/tasks.ts: React Query hooks for retrieving, creating, updating, deleting, and bulk operations on tasks, wired to the actor with cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, recreating it on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Hooks to fetch and update the authenticated user's profile using the actor and React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeferredUrlCleanup: Captures secret URL parameters, stores them in sessionStorage, and removes them from the URL on mount.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, login flow, and stored identity handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom CSS variables for themes, colors, and base styling.
frontend/src/lib/dataParser.ts: Deprecated helpers for parsing and encoding legacy client data structures.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, global styles, and renders the root app.
frontend/src/pages/AssigneesPage.tsx: Displays and manages assignees with search, selection, bulk deletion, and dialogs for create, edit, and bulk upload.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed client info with task statistics, task list filtering, and dialogs for editing the client and adding tasks.
frontend/src/pages/ClientsPage.tsx: Lists clients with search, selection, bulk delete, and dialogs for adding or bulk-uploading clients.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Generates task-related metrics, upcoming and overdue task lists, and links to filtered task views.
frontend/src/pages/TasksPage.tsx: Provides full task management with filtering, sorting, bulk actions, editing, exporting, and quick status updates.
frontend/src/utils/assigneeCsv.ts: Handles CSV template generation and parsing for assignee bulk upload, including validation and backend mapping.
frontend/src/utils/clientCsv.ts: Provides CSV template generation, download, parsing, and validation utilities for bulk client upload.
frontend/src/utils/taskAggregations.ts: Aggregates tasks by category, subcategory, and status to produce revenue and count statistics.
frontend/src/utils/taskCsv.ts: Generates task CSV templates and parses CSV files into validated extended task inputs.
frontend/src/utils/taskDisplay.ts: Formats task dates, currency values, and optional text for UI display with placeholders.
frontend/src/utils/taskExcel.ts: Converts tasks to Excel format, loads SheetJS, and exports a styled Excel file for download.
frontend/src/utils/taskSort.ts: Sorts task lists by various fields using custom comparators for strings, numbers, and timestamps.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Manages URL and session-stored parameters, supporting retrieval, persistence, and cleanup in hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom fonts, colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app goals, architectural notes, known issues, and existing feature definitions for a task/client management app.
